name: Cheap Beer
description: Cheep beer likely sourced from your average tavern. Restores fatigue when drank.

name: Water Flask
description: Clean water in a cheap metal flask. Restores a small amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Water Jug
description: Clean water in a ceramic jug. Restores a small amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Berry Water
description: Clean water flavored with crushed berries. Restores a large amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Orange Water
description: Clean water flavored with oranges. Restores a large amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Cheap Ale
description: A bottle of cheap ale likely sourced from a tavern or inn. Restores a small amount fatigue when drank.

name: Cheap Mead
description: A bottle of cheap mead likely sourced from a tavern or inn. Restores a small amount fatigue when drank.

name: Quality Ale
description: A bottle of quality ale that would satisfy any warrior. Restores a large amount fatigue when drank.

name: Quality Wine
description: A bottle of quality wine that would satisfy any noble. Restores a large amount fatigue when drank.

name: Quality Beer
description: A bottle of quality ale that would satisfy any peasant. Restores a large amount fatigue when drank.

name: Quality Mead
description: A bottle of quality mead that would satisfy any warrior. Restores a large amount fatigue when drank.

name: High Quality Mead
description: A bottle of high quality mead. It would fetch a good price for its weight, if one could stand giving it away. Restores a vast amount fatigue when drank.

name: High Quality Ale
description: A bottle of high quality ale. It would fetch a good price for its weight, if one could stand giving it away. Restores a vast amount fatigue when drank.

name: High Quality Beer
description: A bottle of high quality beer. It would fetch a good price for its weight, if one could stand giving it away. Restores a vast amount fatigue when drank.

name: High Quality Wine
description: A bottle of high quality wine. It would fetch a good price for its weight, if one could stand giving it away. Restores a vast amount fatigue when drank.

name: Cheap Bottle of Wine
description: A bottle of cheap wine likely sourced from a tavern or inn. Restores a small amount fatigue when drank.

name: Bubbly Orange Water
description: A bottle of orange flavored water that has been enchanted by an Aeromancer to be bubbly and delicious. Restores a vast amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Bubbly Berry Water
description: A bottle of berry flavored water that has been enchanted by an Aeromancer to be bubbly and delicious. Restores a vast amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Bubbly Beer
description: A bottle of beer that has been enchanted by an Aeromancer to be bubbly and delicious. Restores a vast amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Bubbly Mead
description: A bottle of mead that has been enchanted by an Aeromancer to be bubbly and delicious. Restores a vast amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Bubbly Ale
description: A bottle of ale that has been enchanted by an Aeromancer to be bubbly and delicious. Restores a vast amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Bubbly Wine
description: A bottle of wine that has been enchanted by an Aeromancer to be bubbly and delicious. Restores a vast amount of fatigue when drank.

name: Battle Brew
description: A flask of bear flavored with magical spices and peppers. Spicy beyond belief, it boosts one's attack speed and restores fatigue.

name: Mage's Brew
description: A flask of blackened liquid from a distant land that energizes its consumer. Bitter beyond belief, it increases cast speed and restores fatigue.

name: Weak Tea
description: A flask of tea brewed from a sparing amount medicinal leaves. Restores a small amount of fatigue and a pittance of health.

name: Strong Tea
description: A flask of tea brewed from medicinal leaves. Restores a large amount of fatigue and a small amount of health.

name: Archer's Brew
description: A flask of high quality tea brewed from medicinal leaves. Calms the nerves, increasing crit chance along with restoring a large amount of fatigue and a small amount of health.

name: Lightning in a Bottle
description: A bottle of blackened liquid that has been further enchanted by a Fulguramancer to contain the essence of lightning. Bitter beyond belief, it increases movement speed and restores a large amount of fatigue.
